profileText: a Representative from Delaware; born in Wilmington, New Castle County, Del., August 9, 1990; graduated from Cab Calloway School of the Arts, Wilmington, Del., 2009; B.A., American University, Washington, D.C., 2013; author; public advocate; member of the Delaware state senate, 2020-2024; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).

creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: McBride, Sarah. Tomorrow Will Be Different: Love, Loss, and the Fight for Trans Equality. New York: Crown Archetype, 2018.
Pincus, Meeg. Door by Door: How Sarah McBride Became America's First Openly Transgender Senator. Illustrated by Meridth McKean Gimbel. New York: Crown Books for Younger Readers, 2023.
